Revenue.description: Shopify Plus subscription contracts and related documents

documentTypes.name: Standard Plus Agreement
documentTypes.description: Standard Shopify Plus contracts

documentTypes.name: Multi-Brand Agreement
documentTypes.description: Shopify Plus contracts with multiple brands

documentTypes.name: High Store Volume Agreement
documentTypes.description: Shopify Plus contracts for orgs with greater than 25 brands/stores

documentTypes.name: Non-Profit Organization (NPO) Agreement
documentTypes.description: Shopify Plus contracts for non-profit orgs/charities with special pricing

documentTypes.name: Affiliate Plus Agreement
documentTypes.description: Shopify Plus contracts that are affiliated with a Standard Plus Contract
documentTypes.notes: These will always have a parentRecordID

documentTypes.name: Master Subscription Agreement (MSA)
documentTypes.description: An MSA for Plus - contains only legal terms. Sales Orders will be separate records
documentTypes.notes: Sales orders will have a parentRecordID pointing to this MSA

documentTypes.name: Standard Plus Agreement
documentTypes.description: Standard Shopify Plus contracts for large accounts

documentTypes.name: Multi-Brand Agreement
documentTypes.description: Shopify Plus contracts with multiple brands

documentTypes.name: High Store Volume Agreement
documentTypes.description: Shopify Plus contracts for orgs with greater than 25 brands/stores

documentTypes.name: Master Subscription Agreement (MSA)
documentTypes.description: An MSA for Plus Large Accounts

documentTypes.name: Standard CCS for enterprise Agreement
documentTypes.description: Standard CCS for enterprise agreements (Essentially Plus for Enterprise level customers)

documentTypes.name: CCS for enterprise Amendment
documentTypes.description: An amendment used to upgrade from Plus to CCS for enterprise

documentTypes.name: Multi-Brand CCS for enterprise Agreement
documentTypes.description: The multi-brand equivalent to Multi-Brand Plus, but for enterprise

documentTypes.name: CCS Master Subscription Agreement
documentTypes.description: MSA for enterprise

documentTypes.name: CCS Master Subscription Agreement
documentTypes.description: MSA for enterprise components

documentTypes.name: Shop Pay Component
documentTypes.description: A component of CCS for enterprise - Shop Pay only

documentTypes.name: Storefront Component
documentTypes.description: A component of CCS for enterprise - Storefront only

documentTypes.name: Checkout Component
documentTypes.description: A component of CCS for enterprise - Checkout only

documentTypes.name: Plus Renewal Amendment
documentTypes.description: Plus Agreements auto-renew, but merchants can sign renewal amendments for longer terms/better pricing

documentTypes.name: Plus TOS Amendment
documentTypes.description: TOS refers to online terms of service. No contract in Ironclad for base TOS, but TOS Merchants can sign renewal amendments

documentTypes.name: Plus Amending Agreement
documentTypes.description: Amends the Plus Agreement - general amendments

documentTypes.name: Automated 2024 Rate Lock Amendment
documentTypes.description: Allowed merchants to renew for 3 years at current price, avoiding price increase

documentTypes.name: 2024 Rate Lock Amendment
documentTypes.description: Custom rate locks granted after automated deadline

documentTypes.name: Consent to Assignment
documentTypes.description: Shopify provides consent to assign Plus Agreement to new third-party

documentTypes.name: Incremental Storage Fee Addendum
documentTypes.description: Allows merchant to use more storage for additional fee

documentTypes.name: Change Order
documentTypes.description: Most common addendum - used for business name changes, address changes, contact info changes

documentTypes.name: AvaTax Addendum
documentTypes.description: Provides merchant with AvaTax service for a fee

documentTypes.name: Shop Pay Conversion Addendum
documentTypes.description: Shop Pay conversion addendum

documentTypes.name: Additional Services Fee Addendum
documentTypes.description: Additional services fee addendum

documentTypes.name: Plus NDA
documentTypes.description: Non-Disclosure Agreement for potential Plus merchants

documentTypes.name: Master Services Agreement
documentTypes.description: Vendor/supplier contracts, mostly for software. May contain Order Form and/or SOW

documentTypes.name: MPA
documentTypes.description: Master Purchase Agreement - vendor/supplier contracts for products. May contain Order Form and/or SOW

documentTypes.name: Agency Agreement
documentTypes.description: Vendor/supplier contracts for services. May contain Order Form and/or SOW

documentTypes.name: Order Form
documentTypes.description: Vendor/supplier order form for services
documentTypes.notes: Should usually have a parentRecordID for governing contract

documentTypes.name: SOW
documentTypes.description: Statement of Work for professional services
documentTypes.notes: Should usually have a parentRecordID for governing contract

documentTypes.name: Recruiting Services Agreement
documentTypes.description: Contract for recruiting services company

documentTypes.name: Sponsorship Agreement
documentTypes.description: Contract for sponsorships

documentTypes.name: Membership Agreement
documentTypes.description: Contract for memberships

documentTypes.name: Consulting Agreement
documentTypes.description: Contract for hiring consultants. Often referred to as 'External Workers'

documentTypes.name: Mutual Non-Disclosure Agreement
documentTypes.description: Mutual NDA for vendors and partners

documentTypes.name: Partner Development Fund PPA Addendum
documentTypes.description: Partnership agreement for development funds. PPA = Partner Program Agreement (online terms, no Ironclad contract)

documentTypes.name: Partner Marketing Addendum
documentTypes.description: Partnership agreement for marketing funds and development

documentTypes.name: Co-Marketing Addendum to the Shopify Partner Program Agreement
documentTypes.description: Partnership agreement for marketing funds and development

documentTypes.name: Orders API PPA Addendum
documentTypes.description: Orders API PPA Addendum

documentTypes.name: 3PL Addendum to the PPA
documentTypes.description: Partnership agreement for 3PL (third-party logistics)

documentTypes.name: Flip the Base PPA Addendum
documentTypes.description: Flip the Base partnership agreement

documentTypes.name: *none*
documentTypes.description: Alliance partnership Letter of Intent

documentTypes.name: Strategic Product Partnership Addendum
documentTypes.description: Strategic product partnership agreement

documentTypes.name: Amendment to the Strategic Product Partnership Addendum
documentTypes.description: Amending Agreement to Strategic Product Partnership

documentTypes.name: various
documentTypes.description: Strategic Partnership contracts. Various document types: MSA, Amendment, Appendix

documentTypes.name: various
documentTypes.description: Sales Channel contracts. Various document types: MSA, Amendment, Appendix
